name: happy-hour-the-good-the-bad-the-hopey
title: Happy Hour: The Good, The Bad, & The Hopey
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• No matter who you voted for, this is something worth applauding: Davidson County saw a 70% voter turnout, which is the highest we’ve ever had. [Tennessean]
  • And now, for the letdown: 6% of Tennessee voters listed race as the single most important factor in their decision yesterday according to exit polls. 16% just said it was important. [WTVF]
  • We can at least hope it wasn’t any of these guys. [WSMV]
  • But enough about that. Did you realize that Toby Keith shaves his armpits?? [WSMV]
  • Those of you who have a big stake in the calorie-posting debate can head out to the public hearing tomorrow at 4pm at the Lentz Public Health Center. [WKRN]

Photo by WJ11.
